price: 17. Tango bayambi mibale bakofanda ngambu ya (loboko) ya mobali mpe ya mwasi.
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
